A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A terrible film made up of wonderful parts. I loved The Force Awakens so this was a real disappointment. I loved the casting and the new characters were excellent\, but as a whole this was a terribly clumsy film. At several points even the editing fell apart.\n\nAs a side note\, all of these 'the audience are wrong and the critics are right' articles are terribly suspicious. I wonder how much money Disney is paying for all this influence.
